name: Roscoe
description: Roscoe is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is a proud member of the WebtrES club. With a classic box and buttons design, and arms and legs resembling those of a soldier, Roscoe stands tall as a formidable member of the club. The screen on Roscoe's body, however, is quite unique as it features an adorable cat. This combination of classic elements with a touch of feline charm makes Roscoe a lovable and dependable companion.
